metadata.title: CVE-2022-0812 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An information leak flaw was found in NFS over RDMA in thenet/sunrpc/xprtrdma/rpc_rdma.c in the Linux Kernel. This flaw allows anattacker with normal user privileges to leak kernel information.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
